title: And Mother Makes Five
overview: ...And Mother Makes Five is the final series of Thames' highly popular sitcom ...And Mother Makes Three saw widow Sally Harrison and widower David Redway finally getting spliced after a protracted on-off romance. This sequel series hilariously charts Sally's ongoing tribulations, with the scatterbrained mum and her rambunctious teenaged sons Simon and Peter now sharing a home with antiquarian bookseller David and his daughter Jane.Â
